column5: Does anyone know if there is a problem with obtaining ultra low sulfur diesel fuel in Canada? I have run my older F250 diesel many miles on Canadian roads but my buddies new F250 requires the ultra low sulfur fuel and I could not really tell him what the availability is in Canada since I really never paid any attention. I assume there is no problem finding it. We head up North the last week of June. Thanks for any info.
According to Petro Canada All on road diesel fuel in Canada must be ULSD as of Sept 1, 2006. Later, Jay
